name: ENTITLED MOLE GAME
description:
PAC-MOLE is a game where you play as a garden gnome running around in a hedge maze, avoid moles, collect stars and get through those doors somehow! Luckily everything turns into it's opposite during when day turns into night, is a star really the opposite of a mole? Of course it is! 

You need to insert a coin to play! 

*Ctrl is the other side of a coin

Made for the Global Game Jam 2022.

Credits:
Rémi Fusade - programming
Johanna Josefsson - art and sound
Andreas Lathe - level design
